title: Prisma / Futura style
content:
Hi all,

Anyone have any ideas about this one? Apologies for the quality of the image

Any pointers appreciated, thanks

Tom

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130118020327im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nacion2_4233.jpg)
author: tomdarra

comments.content: it is partt of a layer font i think, some tsjechisch guy made, sorry don't remember the name
Joostmarcellis, you probably mean [History](http://web.archive.org/web/20130118020327/http:/www.typotheque.com/fonts/history) by Peter Biľak. That's not it, but History 14 is close though.

actually no, (i don't think so) there was a tsjechisch type design exhibition here in the royal academy of arts a couple of years ago, and that is where i saw it i think, as far as i can't remember, it wasn't Peter Biľak, but all this isn't helping with the ID
